title: Hanukkah Stickers Sticker Pieces, Great for Arts and Crafts, Hanukkah Decoration, Party Favors, 1000-Pack (Style 5 (15 Sheets))
features: CHANUKAH DECORATING STICKERS: The Hannukah Decorating Stickers will add a lot of Excitement and Atmosphere to all your preparations for your Hanukkah Party! With this Hanukkah Decorating Stickers Kit your kids will be able to design art projects on their own. They will be able to decorate a real event by just sticking the stickers on anything and creating something that stands out!

FUN LEARNING ACTIVITY: Not only are these Menorah Sticker Scene loads of fun and entertaining, but it is also educational. It helps teach children of all ages about the Festival of Lights in an engaging way. This Religious Activities Focus On The Different Parts of Hanukkah.

PARTY FAVOR: The Hanukkah Stickers for Decorating is a real Party Favor which adds Excitement, Fun and Atmosphere to your Chanukkah party that will leave good memories to all your guests! These Hannukah treats are also great as party favor goodie bag fillers or as prizes for that kids’ contest or carnival.
AGES: This Great Arts and Crafts Set is Fun For All Ages. Even toddlers as young as 3 can get in on the decorating fun. Great For Educational Use.

PACKAGING: The Hanukkah's Decoration Stickers come in a 1000-pack on a 11" X 8 1/2" Paper with a variety of stickers and is a great Arts and Crafts Activity for your kids, friends and family! Stand out from the rest by gifting those cute decoration stickers.
BUY RISK-FREE: At The Dreidel Company, We fully stand behind our products with total satisfaction and a 100% money-back guarantee.
